fields.name: Hydrating Ceramide Moisturiser
fields.description: Your skin is going to thank you for this. Our Hydrating Ceramide Moisturiser is deeply moisturising and strengthens your skin’s barrier to shield against water and moisture loss. Perfect for all skin types, this formula helps to build protect harsh environmental factors.
fields.ingredients: Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Salvia Officinalis Oil, Folic Acid, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Pyracantha Fortuneana Fruit Extract, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Tromethamine, Ceramide AP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide NS, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Ceramide EOP
fields.directions: Warm your Hydrating Ceramide Moisturiser with your hands and gently press into the face.

fields.name: Vitamin C Moisturiser
fields.description: You’ll feel amazing with this lightweight and velvety hydrator. Packed with Vitamin C to help correct dark spots and get your skin glowing without irritation. It even protects your face from the future breakouts, and moisture loss.
fields.ingredients: Deionized Water, Sweet Almond Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Peg-40 Stearate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Glyceryl Mono Stearate, Vitamin E, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Glycerin (and) Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Triethanolamine, Shea butter, Olive Oil, Vitamin C, Marula Oil, Carbomer, CI19140, CI16035
fields.directions: Apply a small amount to fingertips and massage into skin using upward motions.
